00027 #include "kvi_settings.h"
00028 #include "kvi_string.h"
00029 
00030 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_MINLEVEL 0
00031 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_0 0
00032 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_1 1
00033 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_2 2
00034 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_3 3
00035 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_4 4
00036 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_LEVEL_5 5
00037 #define KVI_MSGTYPE_MAXLEVEL 5
00038 
00039 // 1 : Common activity
00040 // 2 : People talking
00041 // 3 : Response messages (whois, dns)
00042 // 4 :
00043 // 5 : Highlighted text
00044 
00045 // FIXME: Check the message ranges!!!
00046 
00047 class KVILIB_API KviMsgType
00048 {
00049 public:
00050         KviMsgType(const char * type,int pixId,unsigned char fore,unsigned char back,bool bLog,int iLevel);
00051         KviMsgType(const KviMsgType &msg);
00052         ~KviMsgType();
00053 public:
00054         const char *  m_szType;
00055         int           m_iPixId;
00056         unsigned char m_cForeColor;
00057         unsigned char m_cBackColor;
00058         bool          m_bLogEnabled;
00059         int           m_iLevel;
00060 public:
00061         void setBack(char back){ m_cBackColor = back; };
00062         void setFore(char fore){ m_cForeColor = fore; };
00063         int pixId(){ return m_iPixId; };
00064         int level(){ return m_iLevel; };
00065         void setLevel(int iLevel){      if((iLevel < KVI_MSGTYPE_MINLEVEL) || (iLevel > KVI_MSGTYPE_MAXLEVEL))m_iLevel = 1; else m_iLevel = iLevel; };
00066         void setPixId(int pixId){ m_iPixId = pixId; };
00067         unsigned char back(){ return m_cBackColor; };
00068         unsigned char fore(){ return m_cForeColor; };
00069         bool logEnabled(){ return m_bLogEnabled; };
00070         void enableLogging(bool bEnable){ m_bLogEnabled = bEnable; };
00071         const char * type(){ return m_szType; };
00072         KviMsgType & operator=(const KviMsgType &msg);       // deep copy
00073 };
